This e-petition supports the position that should the United States of America choose to deport Piers Morgan (see https://petitions.whitehouse.gov/petition/deport-british-citizen-piers-morgan-attacking-2nd-amendmen
t/prfh5zHD) the United Kingdom must choose to protect itself and refuse to accept such an individual – effectively revoking his citizenship.

If the decision is made to deport Mr Morgan from the US then he must immediately be moved onto a third country following negotiation between the US State Dept, the Foreign and Commonwealth Office, the Home Office and some willing third party territory.
